Speaker: FemaleOrc
Dialogue: What are you doing here, outlander? We don't deal with your kind.

Condition: the Player is not a blood-kin

Speaker: FemaleOrc
Dialogue: This is our stronghold. Leave.
Event: the Player entering an Orc Stronghold
Condition: the Player is not a blood-kin

Speaker: FemaleOrc
Dialogue: Outsiders. Nothing but trouble.
Event: the Player entering an Orc Stronghold
Condition: the Player is not a blood-kin

Dialogue: Malacath blesses us with this land. It's not for your kind.

Speaker: OrcMiner
Dialogue: I'm here to mine, outlander. So unless you want to dig, get out.
Event: the Player talking to a miner Orc

Speaker: OrcMiner
Dialogue: I have metal to dig.
Event: the Player talking to a miner Orc

Speaker: OrcMiner
Dialogue: Malacath has given me the task to mine. Good ore brings strength to our people.
Event: the Player talking to a miner Orc

Speaker: OrcMiner
Dialogue: Every Orc learns the heavy labor of mining. All spend years in the caves.
Event: the Player talking to a miner Orc

Speaker: OrcMiner
Dialogue: The mines are hard, but Malacath rewards those who rise to the challenge.
Event: the Player talking to a miner Orc

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: The roads of Skyrim lead to many dangers.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: The warm sand of Elsweyr is far away from here.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: The longer we travel the roads of Skyrim, the more empty this land seems.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: The wind blows bitter cold in this place.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: The road makes this one weary.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: We are creatures of the desert. The north wind chills us to the bones.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Khajiit welcomes you, and also your coin.
Event: the Player greeting a merchant on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Do you seek to make a purchase?
Event: the Player greeting a merchant on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Khajiit has wares, if you have coin.
Event: the Player greeting a merchant on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Fortune smiles upon this meeting.
Event: the Player greeting a merchant on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Welcome to you.
Event: the Player greeting a merchant on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Warm sands, friend. How may this one serve you?
Event: the Player greeting a merchant on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Tools, wares and weapons, all for sale at fair prices.
Event: a Khajiit merchant shouting to grab the players attention

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Goods and wares of all kinds, and all can be yours!
Event: a Khajiit merchant shouting to grab the players attention

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Come! Come and see what goods I offer.
Event: a Khajiit merchant shouting to grab the players attention

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Far have I traveled to bring you these fine goods. Come and see what I offer.
Event: a Khajiit merchant shouting to grab the players attention

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: If you have come to see our wares, speak to the others.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit Guard on the Khajit Caraban

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Khajiit is ready for any troublemakers.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit Guard on the Khajit Caraban

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Khajiit is always watching for thieves and pickpockets.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit Guard on the Khajit Caraban

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Bring your coins, but do not bring trouble.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit Guard on the Khajit Caraban

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: This Khajiit guards the others.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit Guard on the Khajit Caraban

Speaker: MaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Speak to one of the others if you wish to buy something.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit Guard on the Khajit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: The roads of Skyrim lead to many dangers.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: The warm sand of Elsweyr is far away from here.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: The longer we travel the roads of Skyrim, the more empty this land seems.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: The wind blows bitter cold in this place.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: The road makes this one weary.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: A welcome to you, fellow traveler.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: The air is so clear in Skyrim, one can see forever.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: It is a strange sight, the white flakes that sometimes fall from the sky.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: A peaceful greeting to you.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: How high the mountains of Skyrim rise!
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: There is much beauty in this place.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Please, come and browse our goods.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: May your bed be warm and your food sweet.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: You honor Khajiit with your presence.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Many fine things are here for you, friend.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Come and see what is for sale, traveler.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: May the sun warm your path, friend.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Tools, wares and weapons, all for sale at fair prices.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Goods and wares of all kinds, and all can be yours!
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Come! Come and see what goods I offer.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Far have I traveled to bring you these fine goods. Come and see what I offer.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit NPC on the Khajiit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: There is no trust for Khajiit in this place.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit Guard on the Khajit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Khajiit are not welcome in the cities, so we make our camps outside the walls.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit Guard on the Khajit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Some come to buy, but others come to steal. Khajiit shows no mercy to thieves.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit Guard on the Khajit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Blessings of the moons upon you, traveler.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit Guard on the Khajit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Khajiit is just a guard, and has no wares to sell.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit Guard on the Khajit Caraban

Speaker: FemaleKhajiit
Dialogue: Welcome to Khajiit's humble camp.
Event: the Player greeting a Khajiit Guard on the Khajit Caraban
